about_the_game:
Winter Warfare Pack

Get ready for Christmas in Hell Let Loose with the Winter Warfare pack.

Pack Includes:

Winter Albert (US Winter Toque)
Winter Covered M1
Winter Alfred (German Winter Toque)
Winter Painted Fallschirmjäger M38
Winter Vladimir (Soviet Union Winter Toque)
Winter Covered SSh-40

Pack available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features mature content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

Realistic depictions of War, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

detailed_description:
Winter Warfare Pack

Get ready for Christmas in Hell Let Loose with the Winter Warfare pack.

Pack Includes:

Winter Covered M1

Pack available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!

name: Hell Let Loose - Winter Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7 64bit
  • Processor: i3-4130 @ 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0GHz (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050ti / R9 280 (or equivalent with minimum 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7 64bit
  • Processor: i5-7600 @ 3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or AMD RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues

short_description: Winter Warfare Get ready for Christmas in Hell Let Loose with the Winter Warfare Helmet pack. Pack available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
